title: [Question] About Hostel fee
content:
Can u plz tell the hostel and mess fees range minimum to maximum.
If possible specify minimum and maximum.

comments.body:
1.35L if IT block

If NBX (better block) then 1.5L
including everything, mess room and laundry
If I took hostel in 1st year then can I leave it in second year or should I have to live in hostel only for all four years....?
you can leave hostel at the start of any year, depends on you
